overview: We are the factory that produce new product-flat art speaker with our new technology which we have got two patents.for our flat art speaker,when it is hanged on the wall,it just looks like normal photo paper or oil painting to decorate the room.the thickness is only 3cm-5cm. As we all know,almost all the customers will have paintings on the wall to decorate the room and will have home theater in the room.our flat art speaker is the best incorporation of the paintings and home theater.it can be widely used.customers can choose the paintings,size and model that they are interested in. Tv is flat,computer is flat.so the speaker is sure to be flat. If you are interested in our flat art speaker and want to know more,please contact me.Skype:szxr110 AOL:flatartspeaker MSN:szxr110@hotmail.com Gtalk:xiaoyan.speaker@gmail.com Yahoo IM:szxr110@yahoo.com.cn
